channel.title: Help with getting people able to connect with my server!
channel.description:
Ok I've hosted many server b4. I recently took a brake for a year. Now I come back and no one can connect to my server please help! I EVEN REDID THE WHOLE PROCESS OF PORTFORWARDING AND EVERYTHING!
Could someone help me on TeamViewer? Or reply telling me what to do!
Who ever helps me fix it get Co-Owner no lie!

item.title: Help with getting people able to connect with my server!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

13lack drag:

screw portforward. et no-ip and utorrent. make sure utorrent has port 43594 open by going options prefereces, run ur server then ur goood ^.^

Yes, thanks for adding that I forgot. But remember, port forwarding is a lot better. I don’t know why but that’s what people say.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


^Utorrent guide.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with getting people able to connect with my server!

item.title: Help with getting people able to connect with my server!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Dclawrushz:

Who ever helps me fix it get Co-Owner no lie!

Woah no lie!? I’m pissing my pants right now! Haha jk.
Please post the things you’re stuck on and we can help. If it has something to do with the Client files PLEASE post it in Client Help. If it has something to do with the Source files, this is the right section. Make sure you port forwarded in Single Port Forwarding and Port Range Forwarding. It should look something like this:

Singe Port Forwarding

helping.png1023×575

Port Range Forwarding

helping2.png1023×575

Also you must change the IP in the client to your IP, which is in the Client files. Please post that in Client Help. Remember to include the Revision/Base.(Ex of the Revision: 317, Ex of the Base: Project Insanity)

To make sure you’re not missing anything in the process of making a server, check here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
